Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.

Learn more about using Distill at <https://rstudio.github.io/distill>.

To read excel files

```{r}
library(readxl)

assess_data_1 <- read_xlsx(path = "CAT_AssessmentData_AUS.xlsx", 
                  skip = 23) 
assess_data_1

effort_share <- read_xlsx(path = "CAT_AssessmentData_AUS.xlsx", 
                  skip = 21, 
                  sheet = "EffortSharing") 
effort_share


country_1 <- read_xlsx(path = "Country emissions_ AUS data.xlsx")
country_1
```
